alert.note: Alert for Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 25 at 11:44AM MDT until April 26 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 14 inches. * WHERE...Walsenburg Vicinity and the Upper Huerfano River Basin below 7500 feet. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
